dao.db

Class CouponDaoDb

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CouponDaoDb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponDAO

    public class CouponDaoDb
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponDAO
    there is no business logic in this layer. only CRUD (create,read,update and delete) methods and simple methods that will be in use in the facade layer according to the user needs.
